price: Who is better guided: the one who walks stumbling and falling on his face or the one who walks upright on a straight path?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَمۡشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦٓ أَهۡدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمۡشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
